title: Mikado
description: Abstract overlapping print in pastel blue, green, lavender and tan printed on a double woven star patterned silk cloth.The 2 two plain weaved interlaced structures making up the ground cloth different densities. Abstract overlapping print in pastell blue, lavender, tan, orange and yellow printed on a double woven star patterned silk cloth.The 2 two plain weaved interlaced structures making up the ground cloth different densities. saffron
